news_header: Dean Forbes, a former homeless teenager turned multimillionaire entrepreneur, has been named the most influential black Briton in the Powerlist 2025.
news_text: Dean Forbes, who experienced homelessness twice as a teenager, has risen from poverty in south-east London to become the chief executive of Forterro, a successful software company. After a failed attempt at a football career, he began working in a call center and eventually made millions through various software firms. Forbes emphasizes the importance of his upbringing and aims to inspire others from disadvantaged backgrounds through his philanthropic efforts. He has been recognized as the top figure in the Powerlist 2025, which highlights influential black Britons.
